name: Magic Pad - Remix Hit Songs
description:
Create your own music and cool beats with Magic Pad - the ultimate Launchpad simulation app - from our various fun and upbeat EDM songs. Great news? You can also upload your songs!

HOW TO PLAY:
Magic Pad has 3 modes for each and every player. Even if you don't know anything about Launchpad, you still can play it in the easiest way.

» Practice Mode: Practice Mode: follow the color lights on the drum pads, tap them!

» Remix Mode: remix your songs with numerous Sound Effect Packs - SFX - which you can purchase in Magic Pad store. The star feature in this mode is you can upload your favorite songs! Let become DJ or EDM producer every time & everywhere and share them with players all around the world!

» Collab Mode: similar to Remix Mode, but here you can collab with friends and fans around the world!

GAME FEATURES:
» Free trendy song packs with regular updates.
» Keep up with beat makers that you follow and discover new content daily.
» High-quality samples (uncompressed 16-bit, 44.1 KHz).
» Many SFX in different genres: EDM, Rock, Pop, Country, etc.
» Music session recording and sharing.

Magic Pad app is fairly easy-to-use for beginners and challenging enough for mastered rhythm makers!

Please send us your questions or feedback to support@amanotes.com
